a 9:1 mix of the iST kit's LC-LOAD buffer and 0.15% w/v N-Dodecyl-β-D-maltoside (DDM, 0.015% final)
a 9:1 mix of the iST kit's LC-LOAD buffer and 0.015% w/v N-Dodecyl-β-D-maltoside (DDM, 0.0015% final)
the iST kit's LC LOAD buffer
0.1% FA (Formic Acid)
1% FA (Formic Acid)
5% FA (Formic Acid)
0.01% TFA (Trifluoroacetic Acid)
0.1% TFA (Trifluoroacetic Acid)
1% TFA (Trifluoroacetic Acid)
